overview:
Sanjiv Gupta is the Founder and CEO of VSSOD Corporation. VSSOD is an enterprise applications company providing real time execution applications to large enterprise SAP customers. The applications are enabled on enterprise web portals and new age mobile devices, offered on premise or on cloud.

Sanjiv is a High Tech industry expert, and a veteran in the SAP eco-system. He brings over 18 years industry experience across High Tech, Electronics manufacturing, Software, Component supplier, Project Engineering companies. He has spent over 14 years in the SAP Ecosystem as a consultant, program manager, solution expert, end user, customer, sales executive and customer evangelist.

degrees.subject: Mechanical Engineering
degrees.institution: Motilal Nehru National Institute of Technology
